utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: Clearly, Lil Wayne answers to no one.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Is that an interview that you actually gave with Katie Couric?

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: Is that an interview that I actually gave with Katie Couric?

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Yeah.

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: What's your name again?

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Well, that's not the question.

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: Pete Ross. That's a stupid ass question. You just saw me on there giving an interview with her.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Okay, so that was you. Did you perform at the Virgin Mobile Music Fest in 2008 with Kanye West?

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: I don't know. But I know I did perform at this badass bitch birthday party recently. She was crazy stupid thick.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Isn't it something that you would remember if your album the Carter 3 was the biggest selling album of the year in 2008?

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: Isn't it something that I would remember that?

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Yes.

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: Isn't that a personal opinion type question? That's why I got that. I mean, because I would be actually answering the question to. Isn't it something. That's my question. Isn't it something that you would remember? Isn't it something. That's the question I have to answer, your honor. Isn't it something.

utterances.speaker: Speaker C
utterances.text: Do the best. Try to answer it.

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: Yes. Something out of your ass. That's my answer. Yeah, it is something out of your ass.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Have you ever hired a photographer to photograph an event?

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: Have I ever hired a photographer to photograph an event? Sorry, sir, no. I'm a superstar. People hire them their selves to photograph me. We don't hire them.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: How would you describe your image in the media?

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: How would I describe my image in the media?

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Yes.

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: I wouldn't describe it.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Well. How would you describe it if you had to?

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: I don't have to.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Well, what image are you portraying in the media?

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: I don't portray anything. I am who I am and you guys portray what you get. Well, who.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Who are you? Who is the real.

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: I'm Dwayne Michael Carter Jr. Okay.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Do you like to portray yourself as.

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: I just answered that and said that. I don't like to portray myself as nobody. Okay. I completely be Dwayne Michael Carter Jr. I don't portray myself as anything. An image is self described.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Well, you have to wait till I'm done with the question.

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: I don't have to wait till anything. Honestly, I. I mean, this guy right here may tell me that I have to wait, but personally, I don't have to do nothing.

utterances.speaker: Speaker C
utterances.text: Go ahead, ask the question.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Thank you, your honor. Do you like to.

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: You know he can't save you. Right? In the real world. That guy right there. He can't save you in the real world. Just so you know.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: What does that mean?

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: I don't have to elaborate.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Is that's your next question? Is that a threat against. Can you just ask your next question, please?

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: He can't save you.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: And what does that mean?

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: I was talking to myself.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Do you recall that any criminal actions were pending against you at the end of 2008?

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: I don't recall any.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Do you recall being at all concerned about any criminal actions that may have been pending against you at the end of 2008?

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: I don't recall.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Do you recall that in the summer of 2007, you were arrested in New York City following a performance at the Beacon Theater?

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: I don't recall that.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Do you recall that police in New York City discovered a .40 caliber pistol on you, on your person?

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: I don't recall that, neither.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Do you recall that in late 2009, you pleaded guilty to attempted criminal possession of a weapon?

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: I don't recall that, neither.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Did you serve any time in jail following the end of 2009?

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: I don't know.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Didn't you serve about eight months at Rikers island in 2010?

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: I don't know.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Do you remember being arrested in or about January 2008 near Yuma, Arizona?

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: No, I don't remember that.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Do you remember being charged in early 2008 with possession of narcotics for sale, possession of dangerous drugs, misconduct involving weapons, and possession of drug paraphernalia?

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: No I don't recall that.

utterances.speaker: Speaker C
utterances.text: Well, how much longer is this line of questioning going to go on?

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Not much longer.

utterances.speaker: Speaker C
utterances.text: All right, go ahead.

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: I don't know.

utterances.speaker: Speaker B
utterances.text: Didn't you win, I don't know the award for best rap album of the year in 2008 for the Carter 3?

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: I don't know.

utterances.speaker: Speaker C
utterances.text: Mr. Carter, you have to wait until the attorney is finished asking the question, please.

utterances.speaker: Speaker A
utterances.text: I'm sorry. That's my psychic. I'm sorry.
